languages.text: {n}Пусть Каллигос и не желает того показывать, но тонкие морщины, вдруг образовавшиеся на его лбу, предательски выдают его сожаление.{/n} "Во время сей охоты погибло немало славных воинов. Подними за них при случае бокал".

traits.locale_text: {n}Пусть Каллигос и не желает того показывать, но тонкие морщины, вдруг образовавшиеся на его лбу, предательски выдают его сожаление.{/n} "Во время сей охоты погибло немало славных войнов. Подними за них при случае бокал".
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Calligos carries himself with an air of indifference, but the sudden furrows on his forehead betray his regret.{/n} "Many fine warriors have perished on this hunt. Raise a toast to their name when you can."
languages.original_text: {n}Пусть Каллигос и не желает того показывать, но тонкие морщины, вдруг образовавшиеся на его лбу, предательски выдают его сожаление.{/n} "Во время сей охоты погибло немало славных воинов. Подними за них при случае бокал".

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos may not want to show this, but sudden thin wrinkles on his forehead betray his regret.{/n} "Many fine warriors have perished during the hunt. Raise a toast in their name when you can."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos may not want to show this, but sudden thin wrinkles on his forehead betray his regret.{/n} "Many fine warriors have perished during the hunt. Raise a toast in their name when you can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos carries himself with an air of indifference, but the sudden furrows on his forehead betray his regret.{/n} "Many fine warriors have perished on this hunt. Raise a toast to their name when you can."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Puede que Calligos aparente un aire de indiferencia, pero las repentinas arrugas que se forman en su frente delatan su pesar.{/n} «Han perecido muchos guerreros buenos durante la cacería. Brinde en su honor cuando tenga ocasión».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos carries himself with an air of indifference, but the sudden furrows on his forehead betray his regret.{/n} "Many fine warriors have perished on this hunt. Raise a toast to their name when you can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Puede que Calligos intente ocultarlo, pero las repentinas arrugas que se forman en su frente delatan su pesar.{/n} «Han perecido muchos guerreros buenos durante la cacería. Brinde en su honor cuando tenga ocasión».
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}尽管卡里戈斯装出了一副不以为然的态度，但他额头上突然出现的细密皱纹表明了他心中的遗憾。{/n}“在那场狩猎中，许多优秀的战士不幸丧生。等你有时间的时候，我们会以他们的名义举杯，纪念他们。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos carries himself with an air of indifference, but the sudden furrows on his forehead betray his regret.{/n} "Many fine warriors have perished on this hunt. Raise a toast to their name when you can."

traits.locale_text: {n}或许卡里戈斯并不愿表现出这样的反应，但他额头上突然出现的细密皱纹表明了他心中的遗憾。{/n}“在那场狩猎中，许多优秀的战士不幸丧生。等你有时间的时候，我们会以他们的名义举杯，纪念他们。”
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Bien que Calligos feigne l'indifférence, une mince ride barrant son front trahit son regret.{/n} « Beaucoup de valeureux guerriers ont péri au cours de cette chasse. Buvez à leur santé quand vous le pourrez. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos carries himself with an air of indifference, but the sudden furrows on his forehead betray his regret.{/n} "Many fine warriors have perished on this hunt. Raise a toast to their name when you can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Bien que Calligos ne veuille sans doute pas le montrer, une mince ride barrant son front trahit son regret.{/n} « Beaucoup de valeureux guerriers ont péri au cours de cette chasse. Buvez à leur santé quand vous le pourrez. »
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}カリゴスは無関心を装っているようだが、突然額に刻まれたシワが後悔の念を裏付けている。{/n}「多くの立派な戦士たちが狩りの最中に命を落とした。できる限り、彼らの名で乾杯してくれ」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos carries himself with an air of indifference, but the sudden furrows on his forehead betray his regret.{/n} "Many fine warriors have perished on this hunt. Raise a toast to their name when you can."

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスは無関心を装っているようだが、突然額に刻まれたシワが後悔の念を裏付けている。{/n}「多くの立派な戦士たちが狩りの最中に命を落とした。できる限り、彼らの名で乾杯してくれ」
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Calligos gibt sich gleichgültig, doch die plötzlichen Falten auf seiner Stirn verraten seine Reue.{/n} "Viele gute Krieger sind auf dieser Jagd gestorben. Stoßt auf ihre Namen an, wenn Ihr könnt."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos carries himself with an air of indifference, but the sudden furrows on his forehead betray his regret.{/n} "Many fine warriors have perished on this hunt. Raise a toast to their name when you can."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos will es zwar nicht zeigen, aber die dünnen Falten, die plötzlich auf seiner Stirn erscheinen, verraten seine Reue.{/n} "Viele gute Krieger sind während der Jagd gestorben. Stoßt auf ihre Namen an, wenn Ihr könnt."
traits.speaker: Quetza-al_Winterscale

languages.text: {n}Calligos, aldırış göstermeyen bir tavır takınıyor ancak alnında aniden oluşan kırışıklıklar, pişmanlığını ele veriyor.{/n} "Bu avda pek çok yiğit savaşçı can verdi. Şans buldukça onların adına kadehini kaldır."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos carries himself with an air of indifference, but the sudden furrows on his forehead betray his regret.{/n} "Many fine warriors have perished on this hunt. Raise a toast to their name when you can."
